Uses of Class
com.vmware.vcenter.vm.HardwareTypes.UpgradePolicy

  • Packages that use HardwareTypes.UpgradePolicy 
    Package Description
    com.vmware.vcenter.vm
    The com.vmware.vcenter.vm package provides interfaces for managing virtual machines.

    • Uses of HardwareTypes.UpgradePolicy in com.vmware.vcenter.vm

      Fields in com.vmware.vcenter.vm declared as HardwareTypes.UpgradePolicy 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static HardwareTypes.UpgradePolicy HardwareTypes.UpgradePolicy.AFTER_CLEAN_SHUTDOWN
      Run scheduled upgrade when the virtual machine is powered on after a clean shutdown of the guest operating system.
      static HardwareTypes.UpgradePolicy HardwareTypes.UpgradePolicy.ALWAYS
      Run scheduled upgrade when the virtual machine is powered on.
      static HardwareTypes.UpgradePolicy HardwareTypes.UpgradePolicy.NEVER
      Do not upgrade the virtual machine when it is powered on.
